Run locally to test

Alcareco production

  • Only alcareco: 
    cmsRun python/alcaSkimming.py isCrab=0 type=ALCARECO  doTree=0 maxEvents=300
  • Alcareco + ntuples 
    cmsRun python/alcaSkimming.py isCrab=0 type=ALCARECO  doTree=0 maxEvents=300

the 

 skim=ZSkim

option can be added to select events passing the ZSkim or the ZSCSkim
